narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Contemporary Family Services is a Case Management provider based in Shreveport, LA. From 2018-01 through 2019-02, this provider received $197K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 860 beneficiaries, billing 4 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Billing stopped in 2019-02, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.
